product_name: DAKINE Louif Paradis Team Mission Snow Pack - Men's
long_description: A collaboration with Louif Paradis, this versatile snow pack comfortably carries gear for the mountain and cubicle, helping you navigate daily commutes or catch the first chair on blue bird mornings.
